meanings.definition: The quality or state of being monotonous.
meanings.sent1: The monotonousnesses of the lecture made it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent2: The monotonousnesses of the dripping faucet was driving me crazy.
meanings.sent3: The monotonousnesses of the clock ticking was oddly soothing.
meanings.sent4: The monotonousnesses of the rain hitting the roof was like a lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The monotonousnesses of the humming fan filled the room.

meanings.definition: The repetitive or unvarying nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The monotonousnesses of the daily routine was comforting.
meanings.sent2: The monotonousnesses of the assembly line made the workers tired.
meanings.sent3: The monotonousnesses of the TV show reruns was strangely addictive.
meanings.sent4: The monotonousnesses of the waves crashing on the shore was hypnotic.
meanings.sent5: The monotonousnesses of the ticking clock echoed in the empty room.
